SEO_DESCRIPTION: This is the portfolio of Elizon, full stack web developer, graduate of the Autonomous University of Santo Domingo
HERRO_DESCRIPTION_2: graduate in computer science from the Autonomous University of Santo Domingo (UASD). I love programming and technology in general.
SKILLS_MASTERMIND: ABILITIES - Html , Css , Javascript, nodeJs, VUE.Js
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_1: Hi I'm Elizon! <small style='font-size: 20px; font-weight: 500;  background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff7e5f, #feb47b); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;'>Graduated in computer science from the Autonomous University of Santo Domingo.</small> where I developed my skills and knowledge, which led me to train in computer science and science in general.
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_2: In my beginnings in programming, <small  style='font-size: 20px; font-weight: 500;  background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff7e5f, #feb47b); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;'>I was programming in a notepad, which helped me to debug the code better</small> and even to improve the programming logic, improving every day in learning.
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_3: I worked <small style='font-size: 20px; font-weight: 500;  background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff7e5f, #feb47b); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;'> collaboratively with other students on some projects </small>, I also collaborated to share knowledge that I acquired during the time I studied.
